component.name: BiglyBT
component.summary: Feature filled, open source, ad-free, bittorrent client

description.p: Since 2003, BiglyBT's team has worked hard to bring you the best open source torrent product in the market. Unlike our competitors, our client is ad-free and our installer contains no third party offers. We provide migration tools for several popular bittorent clients. Switching to BiglyBT from projects using the same source is simple and requires no interactions beyond the initial migration approval. Your settings, downloads, and plugins will all be there and ready to use.

Features
Added “swarm tags” column to Library view
Changed “swarm tags” into real tags
Added “isIPFiltered()” Tag constraint function
Subscription results now support Tags
New ‘max seeding torrents’ Tag option
Added ability to unban IPs in blocked/banned IPs window
Support for per-download completion masking
Make force-terminate on close period configurable
Added an “effective incoming” state for plugin connections
Added IP Filter control to SimpleAPI plugin
Added new “local interface” peer view item
Added menu item to copy option name to clipboard
Added cell-specific menu support
Added timezone offset to public chat messages
Added chat member properties view
New “select all” context menu item for table views
Added library view item for upload priority
Added header to Subscription Results view supporting search
New “toolbar options” right-click menu
New “sidebar options” right-click menu links
Remember expansion state of File View tree
Remember row selection state in Files View across rebuilds
